explains: v. 征税（tax 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: tax system 税制，课税制度
tax revenue 税收；赋税收入
personal income tax 个人所得税
individual income tax [经]个人所得税
property tax 财产税；不动产税
tax collection 征税；税捐稽征
tax rebate 退税；税收回扣

sentences.en: Since there is no way for me to avoid exams, I am currently questioning what kind are the most taxing and ultimately beneficial.
sentences.cn: 由于我没办法逃避考试，我目前在想哪种方法是最费力但最终却是有益的。

sentences.en: This shouldn't be too taxing for you.
sentences.cn: 这对你来说不至于太费劲。

sentences.en: It's unlikely that you'll be asked to do anything too taxing.
sentences.cn: 不大可能叫你去做任何太费劲的事。
